-- This is auto-generated code

-- using HTTPS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


-- using abfss

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = True,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
) AS [res]

-- exploring data types

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = True
) AS [res]
'

SELECT 
MAX(LEN(LocationID)),
MAX(Len(Borough)),
max(len(Zone)),
max(len(service_zone))
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = True,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
) AS [res]

SELECT * from 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    Header_Row = True
)
with(
    LocationID SMALLINT ,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)
)
 as [result]

 -- collating with in the column level

 SELECT * from 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    Header_Row = True
)
with(
    LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
)
 as [result]

-- collating entire database

 SELECT name, collation_name from sys.databases;

 CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_database;

 use nyc_taxi_database;

 ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_database COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

 SELECT * from 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    Header_Row = True
)
with(
    LocationID SMALLINT ,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)
)
 as [result]

 -- assigning column names

  SELECT * from 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
)
with(
    LocationID SMALLINT 1,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)
 as [result]

 -- skipping the rows

  SELECT * from 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2
)
with(
    LocationID SMALLINT 1,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)
 as [result]

 -- external data source
 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_raw
 WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapselearningdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
 )

SELECT * from 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2
)
with(
    LocationID SMALLINT 1,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)
 as [result]


SELECT name, location from sys.external_data_sources
